author: Arctic Monkeys
lyrics:
[00:12.23] I'm going back to 505
[00:16.73] If it's a seven-hour flight or a 45-minute drive
[00:23.64] In my imagination, you're waiting lying on your side
[00:30.27] With your hands between your thighs
[00:35.33] 
[00:40.85] Stop and wait a sec'
[00:43.99] Oh, when you look at me like that, my darling, what did you expect?
[00:51.18] I'd probably still adore you with your hands around my neck
[00:57.73] Or I did last time I checked
[01:02.49] 
[01:08.36] Not shy of a spark
[01:11.40] A knife twists at the thought that I should fall short of the mark
[01:18.57] Frightened by the bite, though it's no harsher than the bark
[01:25.38] The middle of adventure is such a perfect place to start
[01:34.41] I'm going back to 505
[01:38.57] If it's a seven-hour flight or a 45-minute drive
[01:45.80] In my imagination, you're waiting lying on your side
[01:52.55] With your hands between your thighs
[01:57.58] 
[02:28.65] But I crumble completely when you cry
[02:33.65] It seems like once again you've had to greet me with goodbye
[02:40.57] I'm always just about to go and spoil a surprise
[02:47.07] Take my hands off of your eyes too soon
[02:52.98] 
[02:56.84] I'm going back to 505
[03:00.57] If it's a seven-hour flight or a 45-minute drive
[03:07.97] In my imagination, you're waiting lying on your side
[03:14.48] With your hands between your thighs and a smile
[03:18.63]
